mapper.select: select * from member where id = #{id} and member_status = 'Y'
mapper.insert: insert into member values (#{id}, #{pwd},#{name},#{nickName}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{age},#{phone}, #{address}, default, default, default, default)
mapper.select: select bid_btype,board_title,cdate,bc_rc from (select board_id as bid_btype, board_title, board_create_date as cdate, to_char(board_count) as bc_rc from board where board_writer = #{id} and board_status = 'Y' order by board_id desc) where rownum <= 5 union select * from (select board_type-3, board_title, reply_create_date, reply_content from reply join board on (board_id = ref_board_id) where reply_writer = #{id} and reply_status = 'Y' order by reply_id desc) where rownum <= 5 order by bid_btype desc
mapper.update: update member set name = #{name}, nickName =#{nickName}, email=#{email}, gender=#{gender}, age=#{age},phone=#{phone}, address=#{address}, update_date=sysdate where id=#{id}
update member set pwd = #{pwd} where = id = #{id}
